name: 陳志鏗
objective:
本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。

This course will include control system analysis and design in discrete time system.
It also covers materials in state space and frequency domain. 
Some practical examples will be introduced in this course.
schedule:
Week 01 Review of Continuous Control 
Week 02 Analysis of the State Space Equations (I)
Week 03 Analysis of the State Space Equations (II)
Week 04 Control System Design in State Space (I)
Week 05 Control System Design in State Space (II)
Week 06 Simulation Tools Introduction
Week 07 Discrete-Time Systems and the z-Transform (I)
Week 08 Discrete-Time Systems and the z-Transform (II)
Week 09 Midterm exam 
Week 10 Sampling and Reconstruction
Week 11 Open-loop Discrete-Time Systems
Week 12 Close-loop Discrete-Time Systems (I)
Week 13 Close-loop Discrete-Time Systems (II)
Week 14 Pole-Assignment Design and State Estimation (I)
Week 15 Pole-Assignment Design and State Estimation (II)
Week 16 Linear Quadratic Optimal Estimation
Week 17 Project Discussion
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework 15%
Midterm test 25%
Final project 35%
FInal Exam 25%
materials:
Text Book: Digital Control System Analysis and Design, Phillips and Nagle, 4th ed
Reference: Modern Control Engineering, by K. Ogata, 5th ed..
